scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "convex,backend,frontend" "bunx convex dev" "cd backend && bun run dev" "cd frontend && bun run dev"
scripts.postinstall: command -v bun >/dev/null && bun install --cwd backend && bun install --cwd frontend || true
